description:
In:

http://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/nova/tree/nova/api/openstack/rest_api_version_history.rst#n47

it says:

"Exposed ``delete_on_termination`` for ``attached_volumes`` in ``os-extended-volumes``."

But the actual key to that dict is 'volumes_attached':

http://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/nova/tree/nova/api/openstack/compute/extended_volumes.py#n41

So the doc should be updated.
title: REST API version history docs has wrong os-extended-volumes note for v2.3

comments.content:
In:

http://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/nova/tree/nova/api/openstack/rest_api_version_history.rst#n47

it says:

"Exposed ``delete_on_termination`` for ``attached_volumes`` in ``os-extended-volumes``."

But the actual key to that dict is 'volumes_attached':

http://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/nova/tree/nova/api/openstack/compute/extended_volumes.py#n41

So the doc should be updated.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~mriedem

comments.content:
Fix proposed to branch: master
Review: https://review.openstack.org/240035
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content:
Reviewed:  https://review.openstack.org/240035
Committed: https://git.openstack.org/cgit/openstack/nova/commit/?id=7624fe09f84320220b41a30a15e4ddd490fa9859
Submitter: Jenkins
Branch:    master

commit 7624fe09f84320220b41a30a15e4ddd490fa9859
Author: Matt Riedemann <email address hidden>
Date:   Wed Oct 28 13:03:33 2015 -0700

    Fix the os-extended-volumes key reference in the REST API history docs
    
    The actual key in the response is os-extended-volumes:volumes_attached
    so the REST API history doc needs to be updated for v2.3.
    
    Change-Id: I17e8ddaf939718f737b3098357938ecd647e872c
    Closes-Bug: #1511094
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~hudson-openstack

comments.content: This issue was fixed in the openstack/nova 13.0.0.0b2 development milestone.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ttx
